name: Streamline Icons, Illustrations and Emoji
description:
Access the entire Streamline UI assets library without ever leaving Figma.


  • 100,000+ icons in 23+ sets.
  • 24,000+ illustrations in 22+ sets
  • 3,000+ emojis in 4 sets.


Large, consistent sets

Since 2010, the Streamline team has been making the biggest and best icon and illustration sets.

We’re on a mission to create a complete collection that not only looks incredible, but saves you time, hassle and money.


Koi Vinh, Adobe (Sr. Director of Product Design)

“I own several icon sets but the one that I return to over and over is the copious Streamline pack, which almost always seems to have just the pictogram I need when I dig into its catalog.”


Generous free tier

Our mission is to democratize access to high quality icons, illustrations and emoji.

This is why lots of Streamline resources such as 1,000 essential icons for user interfaces are free as vectors. Some PNGs and some powerful features to speed up your workflow are completey free. No sign up needed. 😉


Fast workflow

  1. Global search to find the perfect faster.
  2. Drag and drop anywhere on the canvas.
  3. Resize to any size you want and not just 16px/32px.
  4. Free access to our web app which has more features such as save personal collections, multi-download, global recolor and more.
  5. Customize stroke width of all line type sets.


License

Free users must credit us with a link. Paid users can use these for unlimited personal and commercial projects without attribution. To use more than 100+ assets in a single project, please write to licenses@webalys.com for an extended license. Additional license information on our website.


Support

Please visit our website streamlinehq.com to purchase a paid subscription or to contact support via the live chat widget at the bottom right. Feedback and suggestions are welcome!


– – – – – – – – – – – – – – – – – – – – – – – – – – – – – – – – – – –


Testimonials

Streamline is enthusiastically recommended by the world's best creators, designers and companies.


“The only icon set I've ever used. And the only one I will ever use. No regrets and not even worth looking at other ones.”

Tobias Van Schneider‍ (Semplice)


"The whole Streamline project blows my mind. A truly massive collection of practical, useful, well-designed icons. It's so so so expansive."

Daniel Burka (Director of design)


"Streamline has been my go-to icon source for years, now with illustrations. It works perfectly with my workflow in Figma and Webflow. The quality is that of a French student's penmanship — a world-class craft."

Tim Hansen (UX Product Designer) 


"After all these years I am still a fan of Streamline Icons"

abdz. (Publication on design, photography, and UX.)


These icons and illustrations are super robust and customizable! A game-changer for web designers.

Meagan Fisher (Creative Director, Owltastic)


Happy Streamlinin'

Vincent

@streamlinehq
